required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety,Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for Injection
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Blind, Placebo-controlled,Single Andmultiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess the Safety,Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for Injection in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: to assess the safety,Tolerability, and pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for injection in healthy subjects

detailed_description.textblock: To explore the safety, tolerance and pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for injection in healthy subjects by intravenous administration of different doses in single and multiple administration safety, tolerance and pharmacokinetic tests, and to obtain the safe dose range of the test drugs, thus providing dose design basis for phase II clinical trials.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal vital signs
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 week
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal vital signs

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal laboratory
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 week
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal laboratory

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal physical examination
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 week
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal physical examination

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal electrocardiogram
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 week
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal electrocardiogram

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 week
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KPCXM18 in plasma: Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters：Cmax of KPCXM18 after the first day administer

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KPCXM18 in plasma: Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters：Tmax of KPCXM18 after the first day administer

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KPCXM18 in plasma: AUC0-∞
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters： AUC0-∞ of KPCXM18 after the first day administer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters： t1/2 of KPCXM18 after the

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KPCXM18 in plasma: Cmax,ss
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters：Cmax,ss of KPCXM18 after the 14th day administer

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KPCXM18 in plasma: AUC0-∞,ss
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters：AUC0-∞,ss of KPCXM18 after the 14th day administer

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of KPCXM18 in plasma: Tmax,ss
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 14 days
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters：Tmax,ss of KPCXM18 after the 14th day administer

arm_group.description: KPCXM18 ，freeze-dried powder,single and multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route
Placebo, freeze-dried powder,single and multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route
